body_en: At the same time, the ease of replacing them with Russian or Chinese producers is regularly emphasised, and successes of import substitution and parallel imports are touted. The topic of organisations' reluctance to leave Russia or their desire to return to the Russian market by any means is regularly cultivated, including the reliance on the fact that some companies [continue to operate in the country](https://som.yale.edu/story/2022/over-1000-companies-have-curtailed-operations-russia-some-remain).
